io.servicetalk.http.api

Class HttpOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • io.servicetalk.http.api.HttpOutputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public abstract class HttpOutputStream
extends java.io.OutputStream
    The OutputStream which provides access to the HTTP trailers.

      HttpOutputStream()

      HttpOutputStream addTrailer(java.lang.CharSequence name, java.lang.CharSequence value)
      Adds a new trailer with the specified name and value.

      Adds all trailer names and values of trailer object.
      HttpOutputStream setTrailer(java.lang.CharSequence name, java.lang.CharSequence value)
      Sets a trailer with the specified name and value.
      HttpOutputStream setTrailers(HttpHeaders trailers)
      Clears the current trailer entries and copies all trailer entries of the specified trailers object.
      HttpHeaders trailers()
      Gets the trailers.

      • setTrailer

        public HttpOutputStream setTrailer(java.lang.CharSequence name,
                                   java.lang.CharSequence value)
        Sets a trailer with the specified name and value. Any existing trailers with the same name are overwritten.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the trailer.
        value - the value of the trailer.
        Returns:
        this.

      • setTrailers

        public HttpOutputStream setTrailers(HttpHeaders trailers)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        this.
